message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I estimate its true worth to be $15,000. Considering its immense value to you, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This represents a substantial saving of $3,000 compared to the market value, making it an attractive proposition. I trust this offer will allow us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
